author: Joe Morgenstern
title: Review: ‘Avengers’ Gets an Incomplete
text: World-shaking events are kid stuff in “Avengers: Infinity War,” the first installment of a two-part sequel to “The Avengers” and “Avengers: Age of Ultron.” The whole universe is under attack from Thanos, an infinitely villainous villain sporting a multicleft, prognathous chin. Universe-shaking throwdowns succeed one another with truly stupefying regularity as the Avengers and their Guardians of the Galaxy allies take turns rising to the challenge. But moments that touch the heart are few and far between in this almost-culmination of a decade of Marvel Comics movies. The finale, scheduled for release in May 2019, may well...
